PROCESSTYPE.name: emailflow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML: <definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL"><message name="injectListJSON" id="injectListJSON"/><process isExecutable="true" name="emailflow" id="emailflow"><documentation>%3Cxml%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxhtml%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22start%22%20id%3D%221%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3Eemailflow%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%222%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3Etemplate%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3ECREATE%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%223%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ECreate%20Template%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%224%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3Eupload%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3EUPDATE%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%225%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EUpload%20Parties%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%226%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3Epreview%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3EREAD%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%227%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EPreview%20Emails%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%228%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3Eemail%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3ELIST_RECORDS%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22end%22%20id%3D%229%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fxml%3E</documentation><startEvent name="emailflow" id="start"/><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask1" sourceRef="start" id="flow1"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="template" id="serviceTask1"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_template_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${CREATEMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask2" sourceRef="serviceTask1" id="flow2"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_CreateTemplate_form" name="Create Template" id="userTask2"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask2" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage3"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask3" sourceRef="userTask2" id="flow4"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="upload" id="serviceTask3"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_upload_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${UPDATEMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask4" sourceRef="serviceTask3" id="flow5"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_UploadParties_form" name="Upload Parties" id="userTask4"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask4" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage6"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask5" sourceRef="userTask4" id="flow7"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="preview" id="serviceTask5"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_preview_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${READMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask6" sourceRef="serviceTask5" id="flow8"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_PreviewEmails_form" name="Preview Emails" id="userTask6"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask6" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage9"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask7" sourceRef="userTask6" id="flow10"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="email" id="serviceTask7"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_email_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${LIST_RECORDSMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="serviceTask7" id="flow11"/><endEvent name="end" id="end"/></process></definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.name: Email Generator and Sender Provider
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<definitions xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test">
  <process id="io.point.email_provider" name="Email Generator and Sender Provider" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"></startEvent>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow1" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"></sequenceFlow>
    <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End"></endEvent>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway" default="default"></exclusiveGateway>
    <sequenceFlow id="default" name="Unsupported" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="endevent1"></sequenceFlow>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Default" activiti:formKey="poi_default_view"></userTask>
    <userTask id="usertask2" name="Preview Email" activiti:formKey="poi_email_view"></userTask>
    <serviceTask id="previewEmail" name="Preview Email" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Email_Create_Obj_fromFields">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="emailTemplate">
          <activiti:expression><![CDATA[${emailTemplate}]]></activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="insertArray">
          <activiti:expression><![CDATA[${insertArray}]]></activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow2" sourceRef="previewEmail" targetRef="endevent1"></sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow3" name="Generate Emails" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="previewEmail">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression"><![CDATA[${apidata_method == "GETOBJS"}]]></conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow4" name="Send Email" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="mailtask1">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression"><![CDATA[${apidata_method == "CREATE"}]]></conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask id="mailtask1" name="Mail Task" activiti:type="mail">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="to">
          <activiti:expression><![CDATA[${to}]]></activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="from">
          <activiti:string><![CDATA[alert@point.io]]></activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="subject">
          <activiti:expression><![CDATA[${subject}]]></activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="html">
          <activiti:expression><![CDATA[${body}]]></activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow5" sourceRef="mailtask1" targetRef="endevent1"></sequenceFlow>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_demo_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="demo_provider" id="BPMNPlane_demo_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="70.0" y="164.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="740.0" y="164.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="150.0" y="161.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="330.0" y="370.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask2" id="BPMNShape_usertask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="330.0" y="440.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="previewEmail" id="BPMNShape_previewEmail">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="400.0" y="58.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="mailtask1" id="BPMNShape_mailtask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="400.0" y="240.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow1" id="BPMNEdge_flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="105.0" y="181.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="150.0" y="181.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="default" id="BPMNEdge_default">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="190.0" y="181.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="740.0" y="181.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="63.0" x="209.0" y="164.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow2" id="BPMNEdge_flow2">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="505.0" y="85.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="85.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="164.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow3" id="BPMNEdge_flow3">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="161.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="85.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="400.0" y="85.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="100.0" x="173.0" y="71.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow4" id="BPMNEdge_flow4">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="201.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="267.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="400.0" y="267.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="100.0" x="173.0" y="249.0"></omgdc:Bounds>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow5" id="BPMNEdge_flow5">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="505.0" y="267.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="267.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="199.0"></omgdi:waypoint>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
